sentences.english: In the water sector, plans are under way to meet that benchmark.
sentences.chinese: 在水務部門，人們正在制定計劃以達到這個基本標準。

sentences.english: to prepare, organize and implement a mid-long term and annual development plan regarding water affairs.
sentences.chinese: 擬訂水務中長期發展規劃和年度計劃，並組織實施。

sentences.english: Han Ying, an official with the Tianjin municipal water administration, says the coastal city is no exception.
sentences.chinese: 天津市水務局官員韓英說，沿海城市也不例外。

sentences.english: The department continued to act as an agent to collect general sewage charges on behalf of the Drainage Services Department.
sentences.chinese: 水務署繼續以代理人身分替渠務署收取一般排污費。

sentences.english: He is working company with a water in France to contact to look for a cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 他正在與法國一家水務公司聯繫尋求合作。

sentences.english: Fierce competition for water projects mean margins may be squeezed in the near term.
sentences.chinese: 對水務項目的激烈競爭意味着近期利潤可能相當有限。

sentences.english: Nathan Rees, the NSW premier, said the government should lead by example.
sentences.chinese: 水務廳廳長李斯說“政府將帶頭執行做出榜樣。”

sentences.english: This Agreement has been duly and validly executed and delivered by SDWIG.
sentences.chinese: 本協議已由中荷水務合法有效地簽署和交付。

sentences.english: Mr Monod was formerly Chairman of the Supervisory Board, Suez Lyonnaise des Eaux .
sentences.chinese: 莫智和是蘇伊士利安水務集團監察董事會的前主席。
